resources.string: Open NC in Pebble App Store
Do you want to open Pebble App Store to install Pebble Dialer to your Pebble?
Opening Pebble app failed. Do you have Pebble app installed?

You appear to be running Android 5.0. Answer and decline functions are not supported by default, but you can gain them using root or using notification answer feature. Use help option for more info.
